May 17, 2008 D SEWBBA (Ebbw Vale) Contest (First Section)
SEWBBA (Ebbw Vale) Contest (First Section) 10 Own Choice Test Piece Contest SEWBBA (Ebbw Vale) Contest ebbw-vale-contest-first-section
Tredegar Leisure Centre, Blaenau Gwent, Wales, UK Best Instrumentalist (TWW Trophy:)Chris Hughes (solo cornet) Markham Jack Challenger Trophy: (best soprano)Lee Elliott (Markham) Prizes - 1st £230, 2nd £170, 3rd £150. 5 bands competed
Oct. 27, 2009, 6:01 p.m. June 30, 2020, 1:33 p.m.
